|blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} San Salvador Island, also known as Watling Island, is an island in The Bahamas, that is said to have been found by Christopher Columbus during his first trip to the New World. It has a population of about 1,000 people, and it is a popular tourist spot. ==References== ==Other websites== * Info on Watling Island Category:Islands of the Bahamas Category:Districts of the Bahamas
